statements: SELECT * FROM vehicle_speed
SELECT speed, timestamp FROM vehicle_speed
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM vehicle_speed
SELECT * FROM vehicle_speed WHERE vehicle_id = 1
SELECT * FROM vehicle_speed WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT * FROM vehicle_speed WHERE speed > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vehicle_id, speed FROM vehicle_speed WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY speed ASC;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(speed) AS average_speed FROM vehicle_speed GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING COUNT(vehicle_id) > 1 ORDER BY average_speed DESC;
SELECT MAX(speed) AS max_speed, MIN(speed) AS min_speed FROM vehicle_speed;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_speed WHERE vehicle_id IN (1, 5, 7) ORDER BY vehicle_id ASC, timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_gps_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_gps_data WHERE speed > 50;
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude, speed FROM vehicle_gps_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM vehicle_gps_data GROUP BY vehicle_id HAVING max_speed > 60;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(average_speed) AS mean_speed FROM vehicle_speed_summary WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM vehicle_gps_data WHERE vehicle_id = 1;
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, speed FROM vehicle_gps_data WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM vehicle_gps_data GROUP BY vehicle_id;
SELECT vgd.vehicle_id, vss.date, vss.average_speed FROM vehicle_gps_data vgd JOIN vehicle_speed_summary vss ON vgd.vehicle_id = vss.vehicle_id;
SELECT vehicle_id, AVG(speed) AS avg_speed FROM vehicle_gps_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' GROUP BY vehicle_id ORDER BY avg_speed DESC;
SELECT * FROM vehicle_positions WHERE id = 1
SELECT vehicle_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_positions ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT make, model, color FROM vehicle_info WHERE color = 'red'
SELECT * FROM vehicle_speeds WHERE speed > 50
SELECT vehicle_id, MAX(speed) AS max_speed FROM vehicle_speeds GROUP BY vehicle_id
SELECT * FROM vehicle_positions ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, latitude, longitude FROM vehicle_positions WHERE latitude > 40 AND longitude < -100
SELECT * FROM vehicle_speeds WHERE speed BETWEEN 60 AND 80 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT vehicle_info.make, vehicle_info.model, vehicle_speeds.speed FROM vehicle_info INNER JOIN vehicle_speeds ON vehicle_info.vehicle_id = vehicle_speeds.vehicle_id
SELECT vehicle_info.make, vehicle_info.color, vehicle_speeds.speed FROM vehicle_info LEFT JOIN vehicle_speeds ON vehicle_info.vehicle_id = vehicle_speeds.vehicle_id WHERE vehicle_speeds.speed > 70
SELECT * FROM Vehicle;
SELECT id, make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE id = 1;
SELECT make, model, id FROM Vehicle ORDER BY make ASC;
SELECT id, make, model FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT * FROM GPSData ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE make = 'Toyota';
SELECT make, model FROM Vehicle ORDER BY make ASC, model DESC;

SELECT Vehicle.make, GPSData.timestamp, SpeedData.speed FROM Vehicle JOIN GPSData ON Vehicle.id = GPSData.vehicle_id JOIN SpeedData ON GPSData.id = SpeedData.gps_data_id WHERE SpeedData.speed > 100 ORDER BY GPSData.timestamp DESC;

SELECT Vehicle.make, AVG(SpeedData.speed) AS avg_speed FROM Vehicle JOIN GPSData ON Vehicle.id = GPSData.vehicle_id JOIN SpeedData ON GPSData.id = SpeedData.gps_data_id GROUP BY Vehicle.make HAVING AVG(SpeedData.speed) > 80;

SELECT Vehicle.make, COUNT(DISTINCT SpeedData.speed) AS num_speed_values FROM Vehicle JOIN GPSData ON Vehicle.id = GPSData.vehicle_id JOIN SpeedData ON GPSData.id = SpeedData.gps_data_id GROUP BY Vehicle.make ORDER BY num_speed_values DESC;
SELECT * FROM Vehicle ORDER BY manufacturer ASC, year DESC;
SELECT vehicle_id, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE manufacturer = 'Toyota';
SELECT data_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM GPSData WHERE vehicle_id = '7d3cfa29-93f1-4c28-84df-56e27b3d6bed';
SELECT * FROM SpeedLimit WHERE road_type = 'highway' AND max_speed > 60;
SELECT event_id, violation_distance FROM SpeedingEvent WHERE violation_time > INTERVAL '1 hour';
SELECT * FROM Vehicle WHERE year > 2010 ORDER BY manufacturer ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT vehicle_id, model FROM Vehicle WHERE vehicle_type = 'Car'
SELECT manufacturer, model, year FROM Vehicle WHERE manufacturer LIKE '%Toyota%'
SELECT data_id, timestamp, latitude, longitude FROM GPSData WHERE speed > 60 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM SpeedLimit WHERE max_speed < 80 ORDER BY max_speed ASC
